title: What purpose do the great pyramids of Egypt serve? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Great pyramid are one of the most important landmarks in Egypt. They are the main SYMBOLS for the ancient Egyptian history. It's important to understand an aspect of ancient Egypt here, they believed in resurrection so, they built these (mainly for their kings whom they thought would lead them in the following life) as tombs and they put all their belongings -Jewellery,clothes,wine,weapons...-  in them with their bodies.
